name: Find The Difference (Hidden Objects Game)
description:
New version of classic Find the difference game!


Compate two pictures and try to find 10 differences.
Like a hidden objects games but instead of items you should spot the differences.

1) No timer! Play the game enjoing!
2) Great zoom functionality and hints - all for you!
3) Play lots of levels absolutely for free.
4) Simple, intuitive, cool and cartoon interface.

Thank you for choosing our game!
Hope, you'll be satisfied with playing our game!
